data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Dragon Tail
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

data.name: Druddigon

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Revenge
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

data.flavorText: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Big Swing
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Proud Fang
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Pokémon BREAK in play, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Giga Claw
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Taunt
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Boost Claw
attacks.text: During your next turn, each of this Pokémon's attacks does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.

data.name: Druddigon

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.

data.name: Druddigon

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Tail
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: The red skin on its face is harder than rock. In narrow caves, it squares off against its enemies and charges face-first right into them.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Revenge
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon during their last turn, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.flavorText: Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon, treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Revenge
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon during their last turn, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.flavorText: Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon, treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.

data.name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Dragon's Fury
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Dragon Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon, treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.

attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
